subject: Science
title: What Evolution Actually Means
description: A fast breakdown of What Evolution Actually Means for builders.

hook.text: Evolution doesn't mean 'progress.' It means change over generations.

buildup.text: Organisms vary. Some variations help survival and reproduction. Those get passed on.

discovery.text: Over many generations, populations change as helpful traits become more common.

twist.text: Evolution has no goal or direction. It doesn't aim for 'better' â€” just 'good enough for now.'

climax.text: A parasite that blinds its host is just as evolved as a dolphin. Both are adapted.

punchline.text: Evolution doesn't care about perfection. It only cares about survival right now.

quiz.question: What does evolution mean in biological terms?
